name: Patient Record Management System sputum_form.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Patient Record Management System Patient Record Management System 1.0"]
description: Patient Record Management System是一个病历管理系统。Patient Record Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/sputum_form.php参数itr_no缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://code-projects.org/
